page.title: 16Welbeck Estates
page.content:
Since the Second World War many people who previously worked on the Welbeck Estate have moved away to find better paid jobs in the region. Because of this trend Welbeck has declined over the years. As well as a drop in population on the Estate there has also been a wane in the amount of wildlife. Once there was a lot of pheasant and other wildlife throughout the Estate but this is now tending to concentrate in certain areas. The Welbeck Estates Co. runs the farming on its own land with a workforce of;
Workers 22 Farmers 1 Bailiffs 2
